actions.committee: House Committee on Science, Space and Technology
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Science, Space and Technology.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Science, Space and Technology
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Technology, Environment and Aviation.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Technology, Environment and Aviation

official_title: To incorporate environmentally sound principles into certain ongoing programs.

summary.text: Greener Government Act of 1993 - Provides for the incorporation of environmentally sound principles in programs under the Stevenson-Wydler Technology Innovation Act of 1980, the National Institute of Standards and Technology Act, the National Aeronautics and Space Act of 1958, and the National Science Foundation Act of 1950.

titles.title: To incorporate environmentally sound principles into certain ongoing programs.
